Voice Matrix.instructions: Client is unable to contact the agent assigned/planner for their Group Request and/or unable to access their account

If a guest is requesting to cancel a refundable room, select cancel, and confirm their refund was processed. If the refund does not process automatically then put the refund into the refund queue. Do not refund the RPP.

If a guest is requesting to cancel a non refundable room type (reasons why we would process are agent error, hotel closure or unable to accept the guest, unpredictable or dangerous weather conditions, death, flight cancellations, medical, emergencies, gesture of goodwill due to the hotel's exception). 1. Check to see if the reservation has RPP, if yes offer to email the claim link to the client or the guest can receive 100% voucher immediately. If the guest denies the voucher please reach out to the hotel to see if we can obtain a waiver. 2. Call the hotel and request FOC, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. If you are unable to obtain FOC, ask the hotel for a waiver minus one night (for multi nights), if it's still denied then we can offer the guest the option to add a name so a friend or family member can use the room. If none of these options are acceptable we would offer 100% voucher or 50% refund. Make sure the guest is aware the hotel is denying the refund in case they would like to contact the hotel directly for a full waiver. If you do obtain FOC then note the request accurately and completely. Then process a refund via the Refund Queue for the amount you were able to get waived. Advise the guest of the refund timeline (2-7 business days). Do not refund the RPP.

Voice Matrix.issue: Early departure after check in  (R and NR)
Voice Matrix.instructions: 1. Ask the guest if the guest notified the property or received approval from the property for early departure. If the guest has a hotel staff name please note it down. 2.Call the hotel and obtain FOC for unused nights, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member 's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 3. Process a refund via the queue for the client of the unused nights and advise of the refund timeline (2-7 business days).

Voice Matrix.issue: Asking for a refund on "REFUND PROTECTION PLAN"
Voice Matrix.instructions: If the guest requests for this plan to be cancelled and refunded, please click on void the policy and the refund will be processed automatically. If it's outside the 14 days to select "void" then you will note the booking accurately and process the refund amount only of the RPP in the Refund Queue.

Items to note.topic: When requesting FOC or Partial Unused Rooms
Items to note.detail: You may not always get FOC so if the hotel denies FOC then ask for FOC minus first night penalty on multiple night reservations.
Items to note.remark: ** it's the hotel's industry standards to charge one night penalty on reservations **

Items to note.detail: We will not be removing this when we are processing refunds, ** refunding RPP only when the guest asks for it to be removed **
Agents will have 72 hours to resolve an issue, if left unresolved in 72 hours the ticket will be transferred to a view for it to be reviewed and solved in house.
Items to note.remark: ** key for this step is in avoiding disputes **

Items to note.topic: If a guest declines service support and uses their own card to rebook themselves
Items to note.detail: Please have them email their receipt to Reservations@HotelPlanner.com to determine if reimbursement is available
We will always offer to rebook the guest, **never leave them without the support they are needing.**

Items to note.topic: If the originial booking was made by a voucher
Items to note.detail: If the booking is made with a voucher: Follow the same instructions for the escalation reason but you will need to ask the channel manager for a voucher to rebook with a new voucher or refund.
Items to note.create_ticket: IF VOUCHER REQUEST IS UNANSWERED IN 15 MINUTES
